products.features:
Features and benefits

  • Perform and combine searches: structured, unstructured, geo, and metric
  • Leverage and access all of your data at high speeds
products.shortDescription: This stack for edge devices assures secure connectivity to the Predix cloud and device lifecycle management using Edge Manager.
products.name: Predix Machine
products.usesString: Imagine having many assets or machines that may be geographically dispersed and/or in remote locations. Predix Machine-powered devices can be installed locally to monitor those assets and run analytics to optimize asset performance. Predix Edge Manager en
products.description: Remotely and centrally manage many edge devices to perform software updates and install edge apps and analytics.

products.features: ['Manage the deployment and lifecycle of large fleets of edge devices','Remotely monitor and centrally manage edge devices and software upgrades','Deploy edge apps and analytics for insights from asset data, saving bandwidth and cloud storage']
